OK so I am trying to add dragon claws on my server but I keep getting an error after step 3.

This is the tutorial I am using : How to add fully working Dragon Claws.

This is the error I get after step 3 :

The other code is different but I am not sure how to change the tutorials code into the code that my source reads.
Here is one example of the code on my source:
